:::: {.question type="formula_question" name="Parametric Stress Formula" points_possible="10.0"}

A steel beam has a cross-sectional area of Area = [A] $\text{mm}^2$ and 
is subjected to a tensile force of Force = [F] $\text{kN}$. 
What is the theoretical stress in MPa?

::: {.formula}
formula: F * 1000 / A
margin: 2
margin_type: percent
answer_count: 5
distribution: even
:::

::: {.variable name="F"}

:::
